name: Flight operations officer/Диспетчер по организации чартерных полетов
description:
В поиске диспетчера по организации чартерных полетов. Работа в офисе, г. Нур-Султан, левый берег.

Duties and requirements:

As a flight operations officer - you will coordinate ground handling services, the aircraft's crew requests for the non-scheduled flights in airports of Kazakhstan.

Flight Operations:
• Accurately recording and rapidly processing customer requests within specified timeframes in accordance with statutory requirements and company policy;
• Processing all ground handling requests for VVIP / VIP / Private / Diplomatic/ Cargo / Ambulance / Ferry Flights / in a timely manner;
• Advising and guiding the clients on their flight clearance requirements;
• Following up on flights movement and keeping the clients updated throughout the journey;

Ground Handling:
• Ground handling set up and coordination (i.e. Aircraft ground handling, catering, hotel bookings, ground transportation for the crew).
• Advising and guiding the clients regarding any airport restrictions, NOTAMS, Parking constraints, making quotations on ground handling services.

Fuel Operations:
• Liaising with contracted or appointed suppliers/agents for all fuel arrangements;
• Providing information on fuel availability, fuel type and price in KZ airports.

General Responsibilities:
• Coordinating specific Flight Crew requests in a timely and efficient manner; and responding with options (when appropriate) to ensure the crews’ needs are met or exceeded;
• Providing transparent information to the management in investigating of complaints or deficiencies relating to the operations department, responding accordingly and promptly, and to provide feedback on issues which arise in the normal course of operation.
• Protecting organization's value by keeping information confidential;
• Undertaking any reasonable duties as specified by the management.

Requirements:
• English level B2/C1 - knowledge of English will be evaluated during an interview
• Recommendation from previous work
• Attention to details, high level of discipline, teamwork, stress-resistance.
• Paid probation - 1 month

What we offer:
• Work in a comfortable office
• Work shift 1/2 (24 hour shift, with 48 hour rest)
• Lunch paid by company
